reason.tex:
%text When a function is defined differently in different regions of it's domain, we say that the function is defined in pieces - or \underline\text{piece-wise defined}.
For example, $f(x) = \vert x\vert$ is defined as
% \[ \qquad f(x) = \begin{cases} -x, x\lt 0 \\ x, x\geq 0 \end{cases} \] %text
Notice, the different definitions for $x\geq 0$ and $x\lt 0$ %
